name: HOT lava ball
description:
THE GAME OF THE YEAR!
Hot lava ball - collect stars or perish!

Roll around and collect the lava stars on each level high up in the air,
spin to roll but do not fall out.
Each level is designed to work but way far from all is easy to play.

Play dozens of levens on different hardness modes and stunning new callenges on each and every new level.

Fun to play for any age as long as you are up for a challenge!
